definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker
Bashi Channel in the northern part of the Luzon Strait, just south of Taiwan

sentences.english: Even before that, they treaded lightly in Basra.
sentences.chinese: 甚至在此以前，他們就輕易處理巴士拉。

sentences.english: This is the bus which they took.
sentences.chinese: 這是他們所乘的那輛巴士。

sentences.english: The bus sometimes stops at a drive-in.
sentences.chinese: 有時候這巴士停留在簡易餐館。

sentences.english: As I arrived at the bus stop the driver opened his big manual hinged door.
sentences.chinese: 等我到了巴士站，司機用手拉開那道大鉸鏈門。
我喜歡這些巴士巡迴之旅。

sentences.english: The bus was traveling from Monterrey, Mexico to Houston.
sentences.chinese: 這輛巴士但是正從墨西哥蒙特雷市駛往美國休斯頓。

sentences.english: I still had to continue my uphill walk after taking the pictures to find the bus stop to take me back to Tsuen Wan.
sentences.chinese: 其後還要繼續步行到下一個巴士站才乘巴士回到荃灣。

sentences.english: I still had to continue my uphill walk after taking the pictures to find the bus stop to take me back to Tsuen Wan.
sentences.chinese: 其後還要繼續步行到下一個巴士站才乘巴士回到荃灣。

sentences.english: If the super bus went into service, there would be no set routes or schedules.
sentences.chinese: 如果該巴士投入使用，可能沒有固定線路或時間表。

sentences.english: If I had left sooner, I'd have caught the bus.
sentences.chinese: 早點動身，我就趕上巴士了。

sentences.english: In Luzhou city proper, there are seven long-distance bus stations in total.
who had been imprisoned in the Bastille for twenty years.
sentences.chinese: 這個貴族已在巴士底獄被關押了20年。

sentences.english: The seat-belt legislation has been extended to bus drivers.
sentences.chinese: 安全帶法例已擴至適用於巴士司機。

sentences.english: Free shuttle bus services to and from Tai Po Market MTR Station is available.
sentences.chinese: 免費穿梭巴士接送往返港鐵大埔墟站。

sentences.english: I could always catch the bus up later in Istanbul or Sofia.
sentences.chinese: 我可以搭乘後面的巴士到伊斯坦布爾或索菲亞。

definition: shuttle bus ferrying passengers between train stations on two different rail lines
to ride as a passenger/to travel by (car, plane etc)
to ride as a passenger (in a car, boat, plane etc)
bus/abbr. for 公共汽車|公共汽车[gong1 gong4 qi4 che1]/car belonging to an organization and used by its members (government car, police car, company car etc)/abbr. for 公務用車|公务用车[gong1 wu4 yong4 che1]
light rail/transit system (underground, at street level or elevated)/streetcar/metro/abbr. for 輕型軌道交通|轻型轨道交通[qing1 xing2 gui3 dao4 jiao1 tong1]
